message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.CC, cs.CY, cs.SE

Reasoning: The paper discusses a variant of the McEliece public key cryptosystem based on polar codes, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the security of the PKC-PC against conventional attacks and possible vulnerabilities on the code-based public key cryptosystems, which is a topic related to cryptography (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the characteristics of polar codes and their application in the PKC-PC, which is a topic related to coding theory (cs.CC). The paper also discusses the reduction of the public and private key sizes of the PKC-PC and the increase of its information rate, which is a topic related to cybersecurity (cs.CY) and software engineering (cs.SE).
